message_1: Suppose you have a sphere with radius 2 cm and a plane that is tangent to the sphere at a point on its surface. Find the distance from the center of the sphere to the plane. Round your answer to two decimal places.
message_2: Since the plane is tangent to the sphere at a point on its surface, the distance from the center of the sphere to the plane is equal to the radius of the sphere. Therefore, the distance is 2 cm.
